page.title: 11Primary Education, St Ives
page.content: Over the last decade, St Ives has expanded rapidly with the building of the Ramsey Road estate. To accomodate this expansion, several new primary schools have been built. The villages of Hemingford Grey and Houghton have their own schools. Children from Hemingford Abbots go to Hemingford Grey. All the schools are in the catchment area of St Ivo Comprehensive school except for Houghton where the children go to St Peter's School Huntingdon. School No on roll Wheatfields County Junior 321 Westfield Junior 284 Thorndown 218 Wheatfields County Infants 278 Eastfield Infants 239 Thorndown County Infants 170 Hemingford Grey County Primary 252 Houghton County Primary School 232
